text:
The City's affirmative action goals, as described in Administrative Code Section 
12B.4, shall apply to contractors performing Seismic Strengthening under contracts with Borrowers under this Program. Compliance with those goals shall be monitored by the Director of the Mayor's Office of Housing and the Program Administrator, as specified in Administrative Code Section 
66A.25. 
(Formerly Sec. 66A.28; added by Ord. 100-94, App. 3/11/94; amended by Ord. 287-96, App. 7/12/96; amended and renumbered by Ord. 2-01, File No. 001969, App. 1/12/2001; Ord. 122-06, File No. 060386, App. 6/14/2006) 
(Former Sec. 66A.26 was renumbered as Sec. 66A.24 by Ord. 2-01.) 
Sec. 66A.27.
(Added by Ord. 100-94, App. 3/11/94; amended by Ord. 287-96, App. 7/12/96; amended and renumbered as Sec. 66A.25 by Ord. 2-01, File No. 001969, App. 1/12/2001) 
Sec. 66A.28.
(Added by Ord. 100-94, App. 3/11/94; amended by Ord. 287-96, App. 7/12/96; amended and renumbered as Sec. 66A.26 by Ord. 2-01, File No. 001969, App. 1/12/2001)
